\medskip
\begin{center}
  \hfill \emph{They used to say if Man was meant to fly,} \\
  \hfill \emph{he'd have wings. But he did fly.} \\
  \hfill \emph{He discovered he had to.} \\
% \hfill \emph{Make now always the most precious time.} \\
% \hfill \emph{Now will never come again.} \\
\hfill \\
\hfill - James T. Kirk \\
% \hfill - Jean-Luc Picard \\
\end{center}
